calculateMerkleRoot(bytes32[],bytes32,ui.details: Calculated merkle tree root for a provided merkle proof.

params.leaf_hash: - Hash of data stored in target leaf.
params.total_leaves: - Number of leaves in merkle tree.

processMessage(uint256,uint256,uint256,(.details: Unpack message from merkle tree and relay it to the receiver.

params.block_number: - Block number of block containing target merkle tree.
params.leaf_index: - Index of leaf containing target message. See `binary_merkle_tree` for  reference.
params.proof: - Merkle proof of inclusion of leaf #`leaf_index` into target merkle tree that  was included into `block_number`.
params.total_leaves: - Number of leaves in target merkle tree.
